Model¶

2019-04-30

author

class panda_core_data.model.Model(*args, **kwargs)¶
classmethod __init_subclass__(model_name=False, dependency_list=False, model_group_name='DEFAULT_MODEL_GROUP', auto_create_group=True)¶

Method that automatically registers class types into data_core

Parameters

  • cls (Model) – class type to be added

  • model_name (str) – The name of the model, if not supplied, the class name is used

  • dependency_list (list of strings) – TODO

  • model_group_name (str) – Name of the group that the model type will be added. If it doesn’t exists, it will be created.
